normal.text: {player1}, start a story with one sentence. Going clockwise, everyone adds a sentence. First to hesitate drinks!
Everyone point to who you think would survive longest in a zombie apocalypse. {player1} gives drinks equal to their votes!
{player1} and {player2}, rock paper scissors! Loser drinks, winner gives a drink.
Categories! {player1} picks a movie genre, then everyone names a movie. First to repeat or hesitate drinks!
{player1}, you're the judge! Everyone does their best celebrity impression, worst one drinks.
Phone roulette! {player1} picks a number 1-10, {player2} scrolls that many photos in their camera roll. Show or drink!
Everyone who's ever ghosted someone drinks! {player1} decides how many sips.
{player1}, give your phone to {player2}. They can post anything to your social media or you drink 5 times!
Everyone votes on who's most likely to become a CEO. {player1} distributes drinks equal to their votes!
{player1}, truth or dare? Group decides your fate - refuse and drink 3 times!

sexy.text: {player1}, demonstrate your best pickup line on {player2}. Group rates it - drink the difference from 10!
Everyone writes their worst date story anonymously. {player1} reads them out - guess who's is who's!
{player1} and {player2}, staring contest! First to break eye contact shares their most awkward kiss story.
Everyone votes on who's most likely to get married first. {player1} gives out drinks equal to their votes!
{player1}, you're Cupid! Match two players who'd make the best couple - they both drink!
Everyone who's ever had a dating app installed drinks! {player1} decides how many sips.
{player1}, recreate your ideal first date scenario with {player2}. Others rate it - drink the difference from 10!
Everyone writes their best/worst pickup line. {player1} judges - worst one drinks double!
